Adam Chazan is a senior at Montgomery Blair High School in Silver Spring, Maryland. Adam applies his knowledge of statistics and data science to his interests in journalism and politics. Contact Adam at [email](adam.e.chazan@gmail.com).

Prayag Gordy is a freshman at Rice University in Houston, Texas. Prayag combines his interests in journalism and politics with his skills in data science and statistics to tell engaging visual stories. Visit Prayag's [website](https://prayaggordy.github.io) to learn more.
